9.text: It is better to live on a corner of the roof
than in a house shared with a quarrelsome wife.

10.text: The appetite of the wicked craves evil;
his neighbor finds no favor in his eyes.

19.text: Long ago you spoke in a vision to your faithful ones

19.content: + \ft Many mss have the singular \fqa faithful one\fqa* instead of \fqa faithful ones.

19.text: you said, "I have set a crown on a mighty one

19.content: + \ft The MT has \fqa I will place help upon a warrior \fqa*. Some translate the word for \fqa help \fqa* as \fqa crown, which is followed by the ULB here.

19.text: I have raised up one chosen from among the people.
